price: Nokorε sε wͻn a wͻ’po nokorε na wͻ’di bͻne no, Nyankopɔn mmfa wͻn bͻne nnkyε wͻn na Ɔnkyerε wͻn kwan (tenenee) no nso-,
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَظَلَمُواْ لَمۡ يَكُنِ ٱللَّهُ لِيَغۡفِرَ لَهُمۡ وَلَا لِيَهۡدِيَهُمۡ طَرِيقًا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna kafarū waẓalamū lam yakuni al-lahu liyaghfira lahum walā liyahdiyahum ṭarīqan
